sentences.en: And expound the quality chain of service corporate quality controlling mechanism.
sentences.cn: 进而介绍了服务企业质量链的质量控制机制.

sentences.en: Expound the different four gradations of Marx's production labor theory.
sentences.cn: 论述了马克思生产劳动理论的四个层次的不同内容.

sentences.en: He has an hour to expound his views to the public.
sentences.cn: 他有一小时可以向大众阐述他的观点.

sentences.en: He warm up as he expound his view.
sentences.cn: 他一讲他的观点就兴奋起来.

sentences.en: In her essay, she drew an analogy to expound her opinion.
sentences.cn: analogy:在她的文章中, 她打了个比方来阐述观点.

sentences.en: It is not necessary to expound on the reason for this one.
sentences.cn: 这个问题的道理,不必多讲.

sentences.en: Landino had taken upon him to expound the same opinion.
sentences.cn: 兰迪诺已着手来阐明他同样的意见.

sentences.en: Not only confirm current legislation, finance mechanism, also expound some suggestions.
sentences.cn: 既肯定当前立法 、 金融机制的积极之处, 也尝试提出一些尚待完善之处.

sentences.en: Objective To expound the law of relation between acupoint and its indications.
sentences.cn: 目的:阐明腧穴部位与其主治关系的规律性.

sentences.en: Schmidt continued to expound his views on economics and politics.
sentences.cn: 施密特继续阐述他的经济和政治观点。

sentences.en: So this paper expound China's macroscopic economic development phase diving and characteristic.
sentences.cn: 因此,本文对我国宏观经济的发展阶段划分及特点等方面入手加以阐述.

sentences.en: The selection and application of stainless steel screen mesh are expound briefly.
sentences.cn: 对不锈钢丝网的选择和应用范围作了概述.

sentences.en: This article takes hygiene, physics, novel for instances to expound this argument.
sentences.cn: 本文以“卫生” 、 “物理” 、 “小说”为例,阐述此一论题.

sentences.en: This book does much to expound the philosophy of the Lao Zi.
sentences.cn: 本书对《老子》的哲理颇多发明.

sentences.en: You can expound on the virtues of eating salt.
sentences.cn: 对于掉在地上的食物,您会毫不考虑地把它拿起来吃.

trans.tran_en: to explain or talk about something in detail
